Sentencas: Various copper oxide cathode materials were studied over a YSZ tube at 800 degreesC and an oxygen partial pressure of 0.21 atm.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the cathode performance of CuO may be improved by doping Ag metal into it.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, an optimal doping content exists and is around 50 mol% Ag.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was also found that copper oxide itself possess enough oxygen vacancies needed for the role of a mixed conductor.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The activation energy for the lattice-oxygen reduction and migration has been calculated to be 55.4 kJ/mol.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By the use of electrochemical measurements over Ag-YSZ/CuO electrodes, models for the two-layer electrode have been proposed and justified for oxygen-ion transport mechanisms at low and high overpotentials, respectively; thus, the roles of CuO on the cathode behavior of the electron and oxygen-ion conductivities were well identified.
Titulo: Cathode performance and oxygen-ion transport mechanism of copper oxide for solid-oxide fuel cells
